participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Jake has a playful side that comes out through his interests in gaming and late-night walks.
participant_1.background: I'm a thrifty hockey fan who is trying to learn Swedish. I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. My favorite store is American Eagle. I enjoy taking late night walks when it's completely dark. I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Determined and reflective, Emma balances her hard work with a love of music and staying active.
participant_2.background: I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous. I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring. I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work. I'd brag about my ability to stay humble and grounded even when I'm on top of the world. I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hey there. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just trying to learn Swedish.
Oh, that's awesome! How are you finding it so far?
It's pretty challenging, but I'm having fun.
That's good to hear. I'm sure you'll pick it up quickly.
Thanks, I hope so! I love languages, so I'm really excited to learn this one.
That's awesome. I'm not much of a linguist, but I do enjoy learning new things.
What kind of things do you like to learn about?
I'm really interested in history and science. I also like to learn about different cultures.
Those are all great topics! I'm really interested in learning about different cultures as well.
Me too. I think it's so important to understand other people's perspectives.
I agree. It can really help us to be more tolerant and understanding of others.
Exactly. It's one of the best ways to learn and grow as a person.
I think so too. I'm glad we're on the same page about that.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
